label: InstalmentPayment
comment: A discharge of obligations in respect of funds or securities, transferred through one of several payments, between two or more parties.

datatypeProperties.comment: The due date for this instalment payment.
A monetary value paid or to be paid for this instalment payment.
The sequence identifier for this instalment payment.

objectProperties.comment: The financing request result document specified for this instalment payment.

referencedBy.comment: An instalment payment specified for this instalment plan.
